name: ContractCompliance-Values-GET-getCompaniesOrHierarchies
description: [Contract Compliance] GET /values/contractComplianceGroup/companiesOrHierarchies/ — Retrieves all companies or company hierarchies the user has access to. Secured by: Process: Supplier Contract - Create/Edit, Scout Service Scope: Supplier Contracts

schema.name: limit
schema.description: The maximum number of objects in a single response. The default and maximum is 1000.

schema.name: offset
schema.description: The zero-based index of the first object in a response collection. The default is 0. Use offset with the limit parameter to control paging of a response collection. Example: If limit is 5 and offset is 9, the response returns a collection of 5 objects starting with the 10th object.

name: ContractCompliance-Values-GET-getContractTypes
description: [Contract Compliance] GET /values/contractComplianceGroup/contractTypes/ — Retrieves all contract types the user has access to. Secured by: Process: Supplier Contract - Create/Edit, Scout Service Scope: Supplier Contracts

schema.name: limit
schema.description: The maximum number of objects in a single response. The default and maximum is 1000.

schema.name: offset
schema.description: The zero-based index of the first object in a response collection. The default is 0. Use offset with the limit parameter to control paging of a response collection. Example: If limit is 5 and offset is 9, the response returns a collection of 5 objects starting with the 10th object.

name: ContractCompliance-SupplierContracts-GET-getSupplierContracts
description: [Contract Compliance] GET /supplierContracts — Retrieves all supplier contracts.

schema.name: companyOrHierarchy
schema.description: Filters the contracts by company or company hierarchy. Specify the Workday ID of the company or company hierarchy.

schema.name: contractSpecialist
schema.description: Filters the contracts by the supplier contract specialist. Specify the Workday ID or reference ID of the specialist on the contract.

schema.name: contractType
schema.description: Filters the contracts by type. Specify the Workday ID of the contract type.

schema.name: endDateOnOrAfter
schema.description: Filters the contracts with an end date on or after the specified date. Use the yyyy-mm-dd format.

schema.name: endDateOnOrBefore
schema.description: Filters the contracts with an end date on or before the specified date. Use the yyyy-mm-dd format.

schema.name: externalReferenceID
schema.description: Filters the contracts by the External Reference ID

schema.name: externalSystemReference
schema.description: Filters the contracts with the external system reference ID.

schema.name: limit
schema.description: The maximum number of objects in a single response. The default is 20. The maximum is 100.

schema.name: offset
schema.description: The zero-based index of the first object in a response collection. The default is 0. Use offset with the limit parameter to control paging of a response collection. Example: If limit is 5 and offset is 9, the response returns a collection of 5 objects starting with the 10th object.

schema.name: onHold
schema.description: Filters the contracts that are on hold.

schema.name: startDateOnOrAfter
schema.description: Filters the contracts with a start date on or after the specified date. Use the yyyy-mm-dd format.

schema.name: startDateOnOrBefore
schema.description: Filters the contracts with a start date on or before the specified date. Use the yyyy-mm-dd format.

schema.name: status
schema.description: Filters the contracts by status. Specify the Workday ID of the status.

schema.name: supplier
schema.description: Filters the contracts by the supplier. Specify the Workday ID of the supplier.

name: ContractCompliance-SupplierContracts-GET-getSupplierContracts_1
description: [Contract Compliance] GET /supplierContracts/{ID} — Retrieves a supplier contract.

schema.name: ID
schema.description: The Workday ID of the resource.
